# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We currently support the latest `main` branch.

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please email `security@colorstackut.org` (update if needed) with details and reproduction steps. You may also open a [GitHub Security Advisory draft](https://docs.github.com/en/code-security/security-advisories).

We will acknowledge receipt within 3 business days and work with you on a fix and coordinated disclosure timeline.
